item.description: Grendel's isn't huge, so I'm going to reserve for a couple of seperate tables if I can- otherwise feel free to sit at the bar. Parking is easier on a Sunday, meters are free and anyone can park in resident zones. You are more likely to find parking away from the main Sq. on Mass Ave or on side streets. There's also a few garages and the T is nearby.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the faces of the people who signed up inside Grendel's :)
item.why: Let's get together! Join us for dinner at Grendel's in Harvard Sq. Even better, food is 1/2 price til 7:30 with min purchase of a $3 drink (ETOH or not.)
item.name: Dinner at Grendel's Den- Harv. sq
